name: StenoMP
short_description:
StenoMP is a font- and software-package for typesetting text in German stenography and is in an early experimental status by now. StenoMP currently supports "Deutsche Einheitskurzschrift" (DEK), only. The support of "Stolze-Schrey" and "Gabelsberger" is planed. StenoMP is intended to be a tool for typesetting stenography, only; but no automatic text-to-stenography-convertor. 
For now this project consists of a metapost font-file, only. It is planed to add a software that generates the postscript files of the texts using this metapost code, later.
summary: Typesetting German stenographic text with LaTeX
